gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.parser

Class ClassPath

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ClassPath
extends gov.nasa.jpf.classfile.ClassPath
    Class that wraps gov.nasa.jpf.classfile.ClassPath extending some of its functionalities.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe

        public ClassPath()

    • Method Detail

      • addPathName

        public void addPathName(java.lang.String pathname)
        Add a single pathname to classpath's names collection. It automatically expands Java 6 classpath wildcards.
        Parameters:
        pathname - String containing single classpath element.

      • addAllPathNames

        public void addAllPathNames(java.lang.String[] pathnames)
        Add all pathnames to classpath's names collection. It automatically expands Java 6 classpath wildcards.
        Parameters:
        pathnames - String array containing all classpath elements.

      • classFound

        public boolean classFound(java.lang.String classname)
                   throws ClassFileException
        Indicate whether a class could be found or not in this classpath.
        Parameters:
        classname - Named package classname of the class.
        Returns:
        true if classdata is not null.
        Throws:
        ClassFileException - if an error ocurrs when requesting class data.

      • getSource

        public java.lang.String getSource(java.lang.String classname)
                           throws ClassFileException
        Throws:
        ClassFileException

      • printPathNames

        public void printPathNames(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        Print all path names added to the classpath. This method is useful for debugging operations.
        Parameters:
        pw - reference to a PrintWriter to print the code.
